frozen.name: gnome-shell-extension-tuned-profile-switcher
frozen.shortDescription: Displays a list of the TuneD profiles and allows to switch between them.
frozen.longDescription:
Displays a list of the TuneD profiles and allows to switch between them.
Of course, this is works only when TuneD installed and running.
